page.title: 09HOME LIFE - SENIOR CITIZEN
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A SENIOR CITIZEN. Mrs. Durey is 64 years and has lived in Castletown for 38 years. She gets up at 7.30 a.m. and after breakfast does an hour's housework. She makes a daily visit to Castletown shops to buy her meals. She prefers to go every day to chat to shopkeepers and friends. After her mid-day meal she prepares for a visit to Castle View Centre where she goes 4 times per week. On Tuesday afternoons she takes part in the old time dancing class. She also goes swimming, indoor bowling and keep fit. Mrs. Durey enjoys these activities, meeting and making friends on these occasions. On an evening Mrs. Durey may watch some television before calling into neighbours or friends for a cup of tea and a chat.
